评论概述: Great looking vintage style bowling shirt!
评论详情: I received my new shirt quickly and it looks just like the ad. I bought my shirt 1 size smaller, than the t-shirts I wear, and it's perfect! I am 5'11" @ 167lbs and ordered a Large. The trick to getting the wrinkles out, is gentle wash (separately) with little detergent and then dry on low heat, with a white dish towel, and a bounce sheet, for a couple short cycles. The steam from the wet towel removed my wrinkles!! (1st pic)

Bought this shirt for my son's chorus concert that was 1950s theme. He said this was very comfortable, and he didn't overheat wearing it. I will say it seems to run a little small, he wears an XL and I got him the 2x and it fit perfectly. Easy to wash and didn't seem to wrinkle up. He wants a few other design/colors in this shirt, and coming from a young man who's sensory sensitive, that's impressive!
When photos say more than a thousand words. Look how amazing my nephews look in these shirts.

评论概述: Comes Shrink wrapped full of wrinkles
评论详情: Where to begin-It's hard to rate a shirt when I think the shirt is soft, comfortable so my husband says. It did run small in our opinion-glad we ordered a size bigger. BUT it came really shrink wrapped and impossible to get the wrinkles out. He had to wear it for a 60's party. I was beside myself. Nothing with much heat if you follow directions so wrinkles don't come out with ironing. Not supposed to dry so put in wrinkle setting in dryer and sprayed with water-wrinkles didn't budge. Steamed-nope!!  I wrote the seller mid Friday and they couldn't get back to until Monday. Party was Sat. and I explained that. I needed their help. I feel for wasting a whole day on this shirt there should be compensation. Why would a company shrink wrap a shirt of that material as it sets the wrinkles in permanently? Now funny thing I read the reviews and no one mentions shrink wrap. hmmm  Someone came in with the same shirt at the party so you know I had to ask if it were shrink wrapped...nope --box and tissue. The company got back to me Monday and they are saying I can't deal with them I have to deal with Amazon.????? They are very evasive and not helpful at all. The shirt would be a great shirt minus the permanent tons of wrinkles
Came unraveled on first washing. Oil changing rag now.
